snippet: Chirlane McCray, whose race, gender and evolving sexuality once made her feel like an outsider, has an outsize role in the mayoral campaign of her husband, Bill de Blasio.
abstract: Chirlane McCray, whose race, gender and evolving sexuality once made her feel isolated and alienated, has an outsize role in New York City mayoral campaign of her husband Bill de Blasio; McCray, as much as anyone on his staff, has built and guided her husband's campaign, thoroughly erasing line between spouse and strategist (Series: In The Running).
lead_paragraph: Chirlane McCray, whose race, gender and evolving sexuality once made her feel like an outsider, has an outsize role in the mayoral campaign of her husband, Bill de Blasio.

headline.seo: Chirlane McCray Plays Key Role in de Blasio Campaign
headline.main: Once Alienated, and Now a Force in Her Husband’s Bid for Mayor
headline.print_headline: Once Alienated, and Now a Force In Her Husband’s Bid for Mayor
